name: Edufun Foundation Trust
briefDescription: ACTIVITIES CARRIED OUT BY THE EDUFUN FOUNDATION TRUST SINCE ITS INCEPTION1.	Nursing- healthcare courses in institute Krishna Study Center2.	Drawing competitiion among students of primary school3.	Blood Group Check Camp- motivate to doante blood4.	Medical check up camp in rural area5.	Sweater and shocks , shoes distribution to needy people in winter6.	Camp for handicapped(divyang) person- guide to get benefit of govt policy for them and make self employed7.	Collect unusual clothes from society and repair then and distribute to needy and poor community8.	Vyasanmukti  (tobacco control) programs in different village of bansaknatha9.	Career guides seminar for students of 10 & 12 10.	Distribution of chakalighar,
